creator: kimberlite@bigfoot.com
text:
Attempted to install ant-1.5.1-6jpp.noarch.rpm on Red Hat Linux 7.1, got error
error: failed dependencies:
    jaxp_parser_impl is needed by ant-1.5.1-6jpp

Needs at least a mention of where to obtain the dependency.

creator: hgomez@apache.org
text:
You should install a jaxp implementation rpm, ie xerces-j2, you could find
in jpackage project :

http://www.jpackage.org/rpm.php?id=581
we no longer provide RPMs, so it is time to close the component as it only causes confusion.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
